all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For thus saith the Lord—I, the Lord, am merciful and gracious unto those who fear me, and delight to honor those who serve me in righteousness and in truth unto the end.
Doctrine and Covenants 76:5
Quote of the Day
"Because of who [Christ] is and what He has done, we worship Him, we revere Him, we give glory to Him, and we follow Him."
Elder John A. McCune | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
